hero.title: Precision CNC Machining
hero.subtitle: High-quality CNC machined parts with tight tolerances and exceptional surface finishes for industries worldwide.

services.title: Precision CNC Machining Services
services.subtitle: We specialize in high-precision CNC machining services for industries requiring tight tolerances and exceptional quality.

milling.title: CNC Milling
milling.description: High-precision 3-5 axis milling with tolerances down to ±0.0005" for complex geometries and prototypes.

turning.title: CNC Turning
turning.description: Precision lathe work with live tooling for complex turned parts and high-volume production.

edm.title: EDM Machining
edm.description: Electrical Discharge Machining for hard metals and complex shapes that conventional machining can't handle.

capabilities.title: Advanced CNC Machines
capabilities.subtitle: We use state-of-the-art CNC machines to ensure the highest quality and precision in machining.

services.title: 5-Axis CNC Milling Machines
services.description: Advanced 5-axis CNC milling machines DMG MORI and HAAS with working area 1000x600x500mm and precision ±0.003mm.

services.title: CNC Lathes
services.description: Professional CNC lathes MAZAK and OKUMA with live tooling, max turning diameter Ø500mm.

services.title: Machining Centers
services.description: Multi-functional machining centers for comprehensive parts production with full 24/7 automation.

services.title: Measurement Systems
services.description: Advanced quality control systems with 3D measurements and metrological analysis compliant with ISO 9001.

portfolio.title: Precision CNC Machined Parts
portfolio.subtitle: Browse our portfolio of precision machined components for various industries.

aerospace.title: Aerospace Bracket
aerospace.description: 5-axis machined titanium component for aircraft structural applications.

medical.title: Medical Implant
medical.description: Precision machined cobalt-chrome orthopedic implant with polished finish.

automotive.title: Automotive Valve
automotive.description: CNC turned stainless steel fuel system component with EDM features.

optical.title: Optical Mount
optical.description: Aluminum 6061-T6 precision optical component with black anodize.

hydraulic.title: Hydraulic Manifold
hydraulic.description: Complex hydraulic manifold block with precision bored passages.

robotic.title: Robotic Arm Component
robotic.description: High-strength aluminum robotic joint with precision bearing surfaces.

about.title: Precision CNC Machining Since 2005
about.description: ExactCut Parts was founded with a commitment to delivering the highest quality CNC machined components with unparalleled precision and reliability.

certified.title: ISO 9001:2015 Certified
certified.description: Our quality management system ensures consistent excellence in every part we produce.

skilled.title: Skilled Machinists
skilled.description: Our team averages 15+ years of experience in precision CNC machining across various industries.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: We invest in the latest technology and training to stay at the forefront of CNC machining innovation.

reviews.text: ExactCut has been our go-to machine shop for aerospace components. Their attention to detail and ability to hold tight tolerances consistently is unmatched.
reviews.author: Michael Thompson

reviews.text: We've worked with many machine shops, but ExactCut stands out for their technical expertise and problem-solving approach. They've saved us countless hours of redesign.
reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

reviews.text: Their turnaround times are impressive without sacrificing quality. We've expanded our partnership with ExactCut to include all our CNC machining needs.
reviews.author: David Chen
